name: Beef Boti Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Beef Boti Recipe: Boneless Beef ½ kg Ginger Garlic Paste 2 tbsp Papaya Paste 2 tbsp Red Chili Paste 2 tbsp Yogurt 4 tbsp Turmeric Powder ½ tsp Garam Masala Powder 1 tsp Kabab Cheeni Powder ½ tsp Black Pepper (crushed) 1 tsp Lemon Juice 2 tbsp Oil 4-5 tbsp Salt to taste Coal as required
instructions: Marinate beef with all seasoning and papaya paste .Bake it in oven or grill on coal. Serve with chutney
